item.title: Contention; War on Gielinor || Faction PvP || HD Client || Updated Daily||
item.dc:creator: @knightlord knightlord
item.description:
@knightlord wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:8, topic:547762”]Going to give my honest opinion.

The idea about having abilities and factions, is great but not yet complete.
There really is lack of unique abilities and npcs to fight.
Having a home for each faction seems fun but the shops are disappointing.
Also the faction gods ask you to bring them resources, but you made most city’s wilderness so it’s pvp mostly.

For the tabs and interfaces, it looks really unprofessional.
The select interface is just a little background with some buttons.
The ability tab is a see through tab with some cut and pasted in buttons, which doesn’t look great.

I wish you the best with the server, although you have a long way to make this actually have a playerbase.
Hopefully in the future i will return to your server, and see the improvements you made. ;)[/quote]

I agree with you on most points. However, I’d like to point out that while most area’s have pvp, you will not lose items unless you are killed by an NPC. Getting killed by a player outside of a typical dangerous pvp area’s, like the wilderness, will not result in a loss of items.

Some interfaces are older, and will be receiving an update when I get the time. If you feel that an interface isn’t that great, you can always tell us what you like/don’t like about it, and we will look into improving it.

Lastly, the current abilities were made to be simple and easy to understand for most people. When the next few tiers are released we hope to bring some diversity and better NPC fights. We hope to bring a Vorago level boss fights soon.

Read full topic
item.source: Contention; War on Gielinor || Faction PvP || HD Client || Updated Daily||

item.title: Contention; War on Gielinor || Faction PvP || HD Client || Updated Daily||
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Going to give my honest opinion.

The idea about having abilities and factions, is great but not yet complete.
There really is lack of unique abilities and npcs to fight.
Having a home for each faction seems fun but the shops are disappointing.
Also the faction gods ask you to bring them resources, but you made most city’s wilderness so it’s pvp mostly.

For the tabs and interfaces, it looks really unprofessional.
The select interface is just a little background with some buttons.
The ability tab is a see through tab with some cut and pasted in buttons, which doesn’t look great.

I wish you the best with the server, although you have a long way to make this actually have a playerbase.
Hopefully in the future i will return to your server, and see the improvements you made.

Read full topic

item.title: Contention; War on Gielinor || Faction PvP || HD Client || Updated Daily||
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Chase1 Sir_Chase
item.description:
@Sir_Chase1 wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:4, topic:547762”]Nice ideas, breath of fresh air. Your links are broken though, take out the quotes and the http’s.

Good luck.

PS: First post in a couple of years, feel special. lol[/quote]

Thanks for the heads up on the links didnt realize they did that…Thanks about our ideas we are trying to be different from the regular rsps because i dont want a boring server i rather have something creative.

nolan2131:

Chase Foster… Still stuck on the ol’ allegiance concept. I’ve always liked it. Expect great things from you.

Haha yeah I couldnt get over it because it just works so awesome! and trust me the best things will come from us (:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:5, topic:547762”]"Marriage System"
Lol nice. Should be funny to marry another male (not that there’s anything wrong with it…)[/quote]

In deed you can marry another male xD it just a small thing to do and we got bored one day and well… weird things get developed when we are bored tbh xD

Read full topic
